roleset.name: make an event known before it happens
roleset.note: FORETELL-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from foretell.01-v)

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: Some experts believe that this foretells the transformation of industrialstructure of this province from a low level , extensive type to a new high level technology dominance .
example.arg: the transformation of industrial structure of this provincefrom a low level , extensive type to a new high level technology dominance
